body.p: Midokura is aware of a network issue that can arise when binding a third interface to the external bridge (ext-net). Symptoms of this issue include slow network speeds, API calls, and CLI commands for Helion and MidoNet, causing the related tasks to be queued. Because of this issue, the midonet_static.yml playbook only binds ext-net bridge to controller nodes 2 and 3, leaving the controller1 node unbound.
